title: What a flash-less Mordekaiser looks like to the enemy Jungler

replies.body:
Morde is like a pufferfish
if he can't get away you can try to cook him
But if you don't know how to cook it you will die
You're supposed to go ghost anyways for max spooky ( And way back in ye olde days it was better than flash on him anyways )

it's still better on him, but people are attached to the third hit Q flash cheese I guess. I think ghost is pretty superior since morde's biggest problem is sticking to people and it's on a shorter CD than flash (which isn't really that helpful in a lot of cases, since it's really not that far range of a flash).
Please tell me you were running Smite and Ignite.
Smite and ghost woulda been fine too
umm, no? Smite and Ignite is the Pentakill album
I wonder what the second one will be called. I mean it IS being made right now. Might get released a tiny bit after the {{champion:83}} update possibly?
They released the first one with the Karthus VU, so it would make sense if they released it with the Yorick update. Even if I'm not a huge fan, its awesome to see
Yeah, I'm also curious how the {{champion:83}} update is gonna go as well.
We all know that it will mysteriosly be stopped in production
Don't Jinx him!
literally walking gold
Had to take off my aviators. For this one.

Please a true Mordekaiser main looks at the enemy jungler as gold.

http://i.imgur.com/ErPK4Ii.jpg?noredirect
All that image that Malicious posted tells them that Morde has way too much gold from killing the enemy team so he made himself a suit of gold armor

when its darius without flash
http://tse3.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.Me78e763efcfbd21d0a5effe5f7c2a147H0&pid=15.1
why, because the poppy fed him
Never gank morde, it's free double kill >:)
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Free gold

Took me a moment... But I got it finally.
